channel.title: New Radar Chart is needed
channel.description: in visualization type, the radar chart is need for analysis. like plotly radar chart [Radar Charts in Python](https://plotly.com/python/radar-chart/) and i know how to contribute the visualization type code for redash, please give me the development link that tell newbies how to add add a new visualization type in the codebase of redash.

item.title: New Radar Chart is needed
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Nobody on the core team is implementing this chart (yet).

V10 release is a couple weeks out. After that we’ll update our “Add a Visualization” guide. From there anyone in the community could contribute it. In the coming months we’ll implement a more transparent process for what features are being worked on by the core team.

Read full topic
